general_advisory: Seeing the clear and sunny sky in upcoming days, farmers are advised to resume their spraying activities in crops. Harvested rice crop should be dried in sun, and then threshed & stored in a safe place.

advisory: To control leaf eating caterpillar and fruit borer in Brinjal, spray 80 g Emamectin benzoate or 80 ml Spinosad per 200 liters of water.
Reduce watering sweet potato to prevent cracking, which can cause problems in storage.
Sweet potatoes gain most of their size and weight late in the season so do not immediately harvest after leaves turn yellow, wait until vines wither.
Nymphs and adults suck the sap from leaves, petioles and fruits
Remove and destroy damaged plant parts
Seed treatment in garden pea before sowing.
Treat the seeds with Trichoderma@ 4 g/kg or Thiram or Captan@ 2 g/kg of seeds to avoid seed-borne diseases.
Provide irrigation to the plants regularly.
Pinching process i.e. removing the top axis/branch of the plant to encourage a greater number of branches can be taken within 15-30 days of transplanting.
In winters there may be various fungal, bacterial and parasitic diseases in the fish.
Treat the pond with CIFAX @ 400 ml/acre just before the onset of winters. Also treat the pond with potassium permanganate @ 1-2 kg/acre or limestone @ 50-100 kg/acre.
